description:
- Modern Yukata: Vermilion "A modern outfit based on traditional Wa summer clothes."
 - Modern Kids' Yukata: Vermilion "A modern kids' outfit based on traditional Wa summer clothes."
*You can buy it at any time in the game shop (Clothing Store in Castle St.) when you purchase it. 
 - Old-Fashioned Beret: Crimson "A recreation of the felt hat that was used when carrying out agricultural work in the olden days."
*You can buy it at any time in the game shop (Fashion Store in Castle St.) when you purchase it.
name: Modern Yukata Set: Vermilion
